subject: Hockey, Ice
Domestic Violence
lead_paragraph: A day after defenseman Slava Voynov was suspended indefinitely, General Manager Dean Lombardi found himself wondering why he, and the N.H.L., had not done more to address the issue.
snippet: A day after defenseman Slava Voynov was suspended indefinitely, General Manager Dean Lombardi found himself wondering why he, and the N.H.L., had not done more to address the issue.
